# Third-party TAR fixtures

Origin (Go standard library test data, commit `1179cfc9b490ce5a8c3adaccea84c79e69f711d7`):
- `pax.tar` from `src/archive/tar/testdata/pax.tar`
- `pax-records.tar` from `src/archive/tar/testdata/pax-records.tar`

Reference URLs:
- `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/golang/go/1179cfc9b490ce5a8c3adaccea84c79e69f711d7/src/archive/tar/testdata/pax.tar`
- `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/golang/go/1179cfc9b490ce5a8c3adaccea84c79e69f711d7/src/archive/tar/testdata/pax-records.tar`

License:
- SPDX `BSD-3-Clause` (Go project license).

Why included:
- Exercise PAX headers and metadata records from a non-Bytefold toolchain.
